thread.title: China Unicom Hong Kong Issues Profit Alert

author: Reuters Editorial
title: China Unicom Hong Kong Issues Profit Alert

organizations.name: china unicom hong kong issues profit alert
reuters) - china unicom hong kong ltd

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - China Unicom Hong Kong Ltd:
* IN 2017, GROUPâ€™S PROFIT BEFORE INCOME TAX IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY RMB 2.59 BILLION, UP BY ABOUT 231% VERSUS 2016
* SEES PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE OF CO FOR FY17 TO BE ABOUT RMB 1.83 BILLION, UP BY ABOUT 193% VERSUS 2016
* FY OVERALL SERVICE REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY RMB 249.0 BILLION, UP BY ABOUT 4.6% VERSUS 2016. Source text for Eikon:
